name: Twenties Flappers Vs The Mummy
description:
A fast talking twenties flapper must take down her political rival, the Mummy. 

Made in about a day from assets drawn on both sides of a piece of paper and Adventure Game Studio. Released October 2009. As of 2022, works best in compatability mode for Windows XP. Music listed in credits.

Controls:

left click - interact

right click - look

clicking on the main character brings up inventory
